title: The Berenstain Bears Go Christmas Caroling
description: Young readers will enjoy reading about the Bear family going Christmas caroling on Christmas Eve in Bear Country with their friends in this addition to the Living Lights™ series of Berenstain Bears books. Children will learn about Christmas traditions and the lyrics to special Christmas carols such as “Good King Wenceslas” and “Jingle Bells.” This holiday book also includes four holiday postcards and a holiday door hanger!
